org.biohipi.image.io

Class PngCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biohipi.image.io.RasterCodec
      • org.biohipi.image.io.PngCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageDecoder, ImageEncoder

    public class PngCodec
extends RasterCodec
    Extends RasterCodec and serves as both an ImageDecoder and ImageEncoder for the PNG image storage format. Currently only supports RGB encodings.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PngCodec getInstance()

      • decodeHeader

        public BioHipiImageHeader decodeHeader(InputStream inputStream)
                                throws IOException
        Decodes the image header from an input stream that contains the PNG image. PNG images are broken up into "chunks" (see PNG documentation), and the PNG header could be located anywhere in the image
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the InputStream that contains the PNG image
        Returns:
        BioHipiImageHeader found in the input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error is encountered while reading from input stream

      • readSignature

        protected static void readSignature(DataInputStream in)
                             throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

        Throws:
        IOException

                                   long crc)

      • encodeImage

        public void encodeImage(BioHipiImage image,
                        OutputStream os)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException,
                        IOException
        Encodes an image in the PNG format.
        Parameters:
        image - the input BioHipiImage to be encoded
        os - the OutputStream that the encoded image will be written to
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are null or otherwise invalid
        IOException - if an error is encountered during stream serialization
